document_title: Acne: Causes, symptoms and risks you need to know
subsection_content:
Depending on the severity of acne, the signs of acne will be different: (2)
Whiteheads are caused by clogged pores; Blackheads are caused by enlarged pores; Small red, tender bumps (papules); Pimples (pustules), are papules with pus at the tip; Large, solid, painful lumps under the skin (nodules); Pain, pus under the skin (cystic lesions)
Acne often appears on the face, forehead, chest, upper back, and shoulders.
subsection_title: mun trung ca.json. Symptoms of acne formation
